description: Works to Trees in a Conservation area:Item 2 Cherry Laurel hedge to bend of access road. Works: reduce to 1.Sm height. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 3 Cherry Laurel hedge between rear of nos. 11-12. Works: Reduce to width 1.2m - height 1.8m Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 4 Cherry Laurel hedge and vegetation to side no. 3. Works: Prune to provide a minimum 2-2.Sm clearance from property and roof. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 5 Cherry Laurel hedge and vegetation to side no. 12. Works: Prune to provide a minimum 2-2.Sm clearance from property and roof. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 6 Cherry to rear garden of no. 12. Works: Pollard to previous. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 9 Cherry Laurel bushes to side rear of no. 1. Works: Reduce to 1.Sm height and thin as required. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 11 Yew to rear of nos. 7-8. Works: Prune to provide a minimum 2-2.Sm clearance from property and roof. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 12 Cherry Laurel in woodland edge to rear garden of no. 12. Works: Remove to ground and treat stump. Reason: to control invasive ground cover into native woodland.Item 13 Cherry Laurel in woodland edge to rear of nos. 4-6. Works: Reduce to 1.Sm height and away from Mulberry & Hazel Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 14 Cherry Laurel in woodland edge to rear of no. 3. Works: Reduce to 1.Sm height. Reason: to abate nuisance.Item 15 Cherry Laurel in woodland to rear of no. 1. Works: Remove to ground and treat stump. Reason: to control invasive ground cover into native woodland.Item 16 Birch, Cherry Laurel and Forsythia to road side between nos. 3-4. Works: Reduce to 1.Sm height. Fell dead Birch to ground.Reason: to abate nuisance and hazard.Item 17 Privet hedge to side of entrance from Crescent Wood Road. Works: Cut back to reveal signage. Reason: to abate nuisance.
